pr_title: Implement Config Store changes for Event Stream IPC.

timeline.bodyText:
Recommendation generated by Amazon CodeGuru Reviewer. Leave feedback on this recommendation by replying to the comment or by reacting to the comment using emoji.
Problem
You are using a ConcurrentHashMap, but your usage of containsKey() and get() may not be thread-safe at lines: 130 and 135. In between the check and the get() another thread can remove the key and the get() will return null. The removes that can remove the key are at lines: 139 and 497.
Fix
Consider calling get(), checking instead of your current check if the returned object is null, and then using that object only, without calling get() again.
More info
View an example on GitHub (external link).
timeline.author: MikeDombo

timeline.bodyText:
Is it possible to simplify these?
greengrassCoreIPCService.setUpdateConfigurationHandler(eventStreamAgent::getUpdateConfigurationHandler);
timeline.author: philcali

Phil is right, and your IDE should even be suggesting this simplification.
Any message in the IllegalAccessError
